title: Retry: Add profile/account summary section to Home page bottom

requirements.text: Add a profile/account summary section at the bottom of the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx). The section should display: (1) the logged-in user's name and phone number sourced from authStore, or a 'Login / Sign Up' prompt if not authenticated; (2) a row of quick-link cards/buttons for 'My Orders', 'Saved Addresses', 'Loyalty Points', and 'Help & Support' — each tapping navigates to the Profile page; (3) a 'Go to Profile' button that navigates to the Profile page. Style the section consistently with the MurkiMart orange (#F97316) and green (#16A34A) theme, using card/tile layout with icons. Place it below the CustomerCareContact banner and above any footer padding.

quotes: retry the build with the profile section and cart additions to the bottom of the homepage

acceptanceCriteria: When the user is logged in (authStore.isLoggedIn === true), the section displays the user's name and phone number from authStore
When the user is not logged in, the section displays a 'Login / Sign Up' prompt card
A row of four quick-link cards is shown: 'My Orders', 'Saved Addresses', 'Loyalty Points', and 'Help & Support', each with an icon
Tapping any quick-link card navigates to the Profile page
A 'Go to Profile' button is present and navigates to the Profile page
The section is placed below the CustomerCareContact banner on the Home page
The section uses MurkiMart orange (#F97316) and green (#16A34A) consistently in card/tile styling

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
Use existing authStore (frontend/src/lib/authStore.ts) for authentication state — do not create a new store
Navigation must use the existing navigationStore or page-stack navigation pattern already in use in App.tsx
nonGoals: Do not add new backend endpoints or modify backend/main.mo
Do not create new auth or address store files — use existing ones
Do not modify the Profile page itself
